user.title: Connect WhatsApp
user.description:
Enter the URL of your WhatsApp Addon.

Typical URLs:
- `http://localhost:8066` (Docker/Local)
- `http://addon-slug:8066` (HA Addon)

[Setup Guide]({setup_url})

scan.title: Scan QR Code
scan.description:
Please scan the QR code below with your WhatsApp mobile app (Linked Devices).

![QR Code]({qr_image})

**Please click Submit after successfully scanning the code.**

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the WhatsApp Addon. Please ensure the [WhatsApp Addon](https://github.com/FaserF/hassio-addons/tree/master/whatsapp) is installed and running.
